name: Invoke-Obfuscation STDIN+ Launcher
description: Detects Obfuscated use of stdin to execute PowerShell
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.channel:System AND winlog.provider_name:Service\ Control\ Manager AND event.code:7045 AND winlog.event_data.ImagePath:/.*cmd.{0,5}(?:\/c|\/r).+powershell.+(?:\$\{?input\}?|noexit).+\"/)`
